column2: ENGLISH
(ED:T) Rules
Show the rules for the "Expanded Decisions: Tributaries" mod.\nIf you are an administrator (ie. in single-player, or the multiplayer host), you will also be able to change them.
Show the "(ED:T) Rules" window
Does NOT currently have the "(ED:T) Rules" window open
Has had the "(ED:T) Rules" window open for 3 months (IE: It might be broken)
(ED:T) Rules

This event shows you the current rules for tributaries in the "Expanded Decisions: Tributaries" mod.\n\nSince you are an administrator, you may also change those rules, by selecting the relevant option.
This event shows you the current rules for tributaries in the "Expanded Decisions: Tributaries" mod.\n\nSince you are NOT an administrator, you may only view these rules (you may not change them).
AI Protectors: Forbidden
AI Protectors:\nCurrent Rule: §RForbidden§! (AI may NOT Force/Offer Protectorate)
AI Protectors: Allowed
AI Protectors:\nCurrent Rule: §GAllowed§! (AI may Force/Offer Protectorate)
New Rule: §GAllowed§! (AI may Force/Offer Protectorate)
New Rule: §RForbidden§! (AI may NOT Force/Offer Protectorate)
Chainable CBs: Enabled
Chainable CBs:\nCurrent Rule: §GEnabled§! (Tributary wars against your tributaries' neighbours are §Genabled§!)
Chainable CBs: Disabled
Chainable CBs:\nCurrent Rule: §RDisabled§! (Tributary wars against your tributaries' neighbours are §Rdisabled§!)
New Rule: §GEnabled§! (Tributary wars against your tributaries' neighbours are §Genabled§!)
New Rule: §RDisabled§! (Tributary wars against your tributaries' neighbours are §Rdisabled§!)
Infighting Interference: Enabled
Infighting Interference: \nCurrent Rule: §GEnabled§! (Protectorates §Gcan§! call their suzerain into wars between themselves)
Infighting Interference: Disabled
Infighting Interference: \nCurrent Rule: §RDisabled§! (Protectorates §Rcannot§! call their suzerain into wars between themselves)
New Rule: §GEnabled§! (Protectorates §Gcan§! call their suzerain into wars between themselves)
New Rule: §RDisabled§! (Protectorates §Rcannot§! call their suzerain into wars between themselves)
All Protectorates in the world are §Ytransformed§! to reflect this rule change
Exit
§MAll players will be notified of this change!§!
(ED:T) Rule Change
Exit
[From.GetTitledFirstName] (Username: [From.GetHumanName]) has changed the "AI Protectors" rule to "Forbidden" (AI may NOT Force/Offer Protectorate)!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] (Username: [From.GetHumanName]) has changed the "AI Protectors" rule to "Allowed" (AI may Force/Offer Protectorate)!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] (Username: [From.GetHumanName]) has changed the "Chainable CBs" rule to "Disabled" (tributary wars against your tributaries' neighbours are disabled)!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] (Username: [From.GetHumanName]) has changed the "Chainable CBs" rule to "Enabled" (tributary wars against your tributaries' neighbours are enabled)!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] (Username: [From.GetHumanName]) has changed the "Infighting Interference" rule to "Disabled" (Protectorates may NOT call their suzerain into wars between themselves)!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] (Username: [From.GetHumanName]) has changed the "Infighting Interference" rule to "Enabled" (Protectorates MAY - and probably WILL - call their suzerain into wars between themselves)!
